level.heading: Pleading.
level.text: In a derivative action under § 29-808.02, the complaint shall state with particularity:
The date and content of plaintiff's demand and the response to the demand by the managers or other members; or
If a demand has not been made, the reasons a demand under § 29-808.02(1) would be futile.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 904 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act).
